text: (ke’inanite) ānidachihu lerisu kezemibabana keweyinochi besiriwa wenizochi yemīfesubati ātikiliti litinorewi፣ bewisit’wami lerisu keyefirēwi hulu līnorewi irijinami līnekawina lerisu dekamawochi ziriyawochi yaluti sīẖoni bewisit’u isati yalebeti wirich’i līyagenyatina litik’at’eli yiwedalini inidezīhu ālahi ānik’ets’ochini le’inanite yabirarali፤ litasitenetinu yikejelalina፡፡
